css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #button-maxi-ffa65f46-u{justify-content:flex-end;box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);min-width:initial;}body.maxi-blocks--active #button-maxi-ffa65f46-u .maxi-button-block__button{min-width:initial;border-top-left-radius:10px;border-top-right-radius:10px;border-bottom-right-radius:10px;border-bottom-left-radius:10px;box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-4,255,74,23),1);text-align:center;background:var(--maxi-dark-button-background-color,rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-5,255,255,255),1));padding-top:22px;padding-right:44px;padding-bottom:22px;padding-left:44px;transition:background 0.3s 0s ease;}body.maxi-blocks--active #button-maxi-ffa65f46-u .maxi-button-block__content{color:var(--maxi-dark-button-color,rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-1,0,0,0),1));font-size:20px;transition:all 0.3s 0s ease;}body.maxi-blocks--active #button-maxi-ffa65f46-u .maxi-button-block__button .maxi-button-block__icon svg path{stroke-width:2;}body.maxi-blocks--active #button-maxi-ffa65f46-u .maxi-button-block__button:hover{background:var(--maxi-dark-button-background-color-hover,rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-1,0,0,0),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #button-maxi-ffa65f46-u .maxi-button-block__button:hover .maxi-button-block__content{color:var(--maxi-dark-button-color-hover,rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-5,255,255,255),1));}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #button-maxi-ffa65f46-u .maxi-button-block__button{padding-top:33px;padding-right:70px;padding-bottom:33px;padding-left:70px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #button-maxi-ffa65f46-u .maxi-button-block__content{font-size:26px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1024px){body.maxi-blocks--active #button-maxi-ffa65f46-u .maxi-button-block__button{padding-right:35px;padding-left:35px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #button-maxi-ffa65f46-u .maxi-button-block__content{font-size:18px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){body.maxi-blocks--active #button-maxi-ffa65f46-u{justify-content:center;}}
